buginformation.description: purpose code changes when comes expression involving the comma operator only the first element such sequence checked for being free side effects the element free side effects classified problematic and warning issued other non rightmost elements are not checked for being free side effects and therefore cannot classified problematic this leads unexpected behavior foo transformed into foo and warning issued only with regard the first element foo bar transformed into foo bar and warning issued foo transformed into foo and warnings are issued with regard the first elements inner sequences only this issue was closed revision 2054 this issue was closed revision 2056 this issue was closed revision 2058
